page.title: 08FARMING NEAR SKEGNESS
page.content: {LINCOLNSHIRE}is an agricultural area.Many of the vegetables needed in England are grown here.Some small farms are privately owned by the farmers themselves but the larger farms tend to be owned by large companies.Although {Skegness}is a seaside tourist town there are farms within one mile of the town centre.Farming here is an industry.Farmers try to produce bigger and better crops.To do this they use a lot of{chemical sprays}to kill weeds or make the crop grow bigger or faster.There is a growing group of people who do not like this and want to change this policy.One group is the {Templegarth Trust}who try to eat food grown without the use of chemicals.They are worried about farmers removing hedgerows to enlarge fields so destroying animal habitats.
